name: urlscan.io
semantic_context: Provides various utilities for monitoring websites like health checks or screenshots
natural_language_description: 这是 urlscan.io 节点。主要用于: Provides various utilities for monitoring websites like health checks or screenshots

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: scan

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: perform

scanId.name: scanId
scanId.description: ID of the scan to retrieve
scanId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scan ID | 作用: ID of the scan to retrieve

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: query (值: None) - Query using the Elastic Search Query String syntax. See supported fields in the documentation.

url.name: url
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL to scan

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: customAgent (值: None) - `User-Agent` header to set for this scan. Defaults to `n8n`
overrideSafety (值: None) - Disable reclassification of URLs with potential PII in them
referer (值: None) - HTTP referer to set for this scan
tags (值: None) - Comma-separated list of user-defined tags to add to this scan. Limited to 10 tags.
